name: S(H)OCKING THEATRE
description:
S(H)OKING THEATRE

Ladies and gentlemen, the function is about to start! And you must hurry, afterall... you're the storyteller. Don't be afraid to make your own stories and share them with everyone. But if you occur to have a sock, that's probably going to be more efficient.

Game developed by Ashes (tw: @Ashes_gamedev):

-Stefano Scola (ig: @stefanoscola)

-Santiago Fernández (tw: @FdezAndresSanti)

-Bruno Pérez de Lema (tw: @Kenobi_B)

-Álvaro Marco (tw: @amarco_dev)

With special thanks to everyone else in the Ashes team.

THANKS FOR PLAYING!

Music: Ghost Processional by Kevin Macleod.

Sound effect from zapsplat.com
